official-title.#text: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide for a right to an administrative appeal relating to adverse determinations of tax-exempt status of certain organizations.

attestation-date.#text: Passed the House of Representatives September 16, 2014.

header.#text: Administrative appeal relating to adverse determinations of tax-exempt status of certain organizations

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: is amended by adding at the end the following:

external-xref.#tail: of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986

header.#text: Administrative appeal relating to adverse determination of tax-Exempt status of certain organizations

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: shall prescribe procedures under which an organization described in
may request an administrative appeal (including a conference relating to such appeal if requested by the organization) to the
of an adverse determination described in paragraph (2).
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Internal Revenue Service Office of Appeals

text.#text: For purposes of paragraph (1), an adverse determination is described in this paragraph if such determination is adverse to an organization with respect to—

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: or as an organization described in

text.#text: the initial qualification or continuing qualification of the organization as exempt from tax under
the initial classification or continuing classification of the organization as a private foundation under
the initial classification or continuing classification of the organization as a private operating foundation under
The amendment made by subsection (a) shall apply to determinations made after the date of the enactment of this Act.
